• Home
  • Music Collection

This is almost my entire physical music collection. I still have more records, some CDs, and cassettes to add to Discogs. Massive shoutout to Damian Walsh who did all of the heavy lifting here. You need to read his post about why he created it. His collection has quite a few more features, it's built extremely well and is beautifully designed. This feels like theft because it is, really. But, I can't imagine it being setup any other way.

I did make a few adjustments here and there to display records the way I wanted. Mostly to handle the duplicates. I'm a bit of a collector and like to have specific pressings of some albums.

I learned a ton about Eleventy in the process. It's not 100% complete, and when I get the blog setup I will write more about it. In the meantime, poke around.
